mamy.midnightconfig.title: Moony Mod Config
mamy.midnightconfig.iFrameInterval.toolt: How many ticks of i-frames does an entity get when damaged, from 0 (default), to 2^31-1 (nothing can take damage)
mamy.midnightconfig.excludePlayers.toolt: Are players excluded from this mod (if true, players will always get 10 ticks of i-frames on being damaged
mamy.midnightconfig.excludeAllMobs.toolt: Are players excluded from this mod (if true, players will always get 10 ticks of i-frames on being damaged
mamy.midnightconfig.debugMode.tooltip: If true, turns on feature which sends a message when a player receives damage, containing information such as the name of the source and the quantity. Use this to find the name of the source you need to whitelist, or the id of the mob you want to exclude.
mamy.midnightconfig.attackCancelThreshol: How weak a player's attack can be before it gets nullified, from 0 (0%, cancels multiple attacks on the same tick) to 1 (100%, players cannot attack), or -0.1 (disables this feature)
mamy.midnightconfig.knockbackCancelThres: How weak a player's attack can be before the knockback gets nullified, from 0 (0%, cancels multiple attacks on the same tick) to 1 (100%, no knockback), or -0.1 (disables this feature)
item.mamy.death_scythe.desc: Swirl enemy around, When using 5 times it gonna apply Grievouswounds. - Consume
item.mamy.death_scythe.desc.passive: When attack on crit target'll move toward you.
item.mamy.hogyoku.desc: unidentified object that from nowhere, but your soul are calling it. - Consume
item.mamy.hogyoku.desc.passive: When already consume you'll grain perma Critical Damage 20% and Take 15% more damage Able to wearing a mask
vizard.already: You already wearing a mask rightnow.
enchantment.mamy.electrodecree.desc: when hit the same target it'll deal Aoe(range 8 blocks) electro damage ,Highest damage on nearest target.
enchantment.mamy.lethaltempo.desc: Swing weapon faster when attack over time
enchantment.mamy.fervorofbattle.desc: Deal 1 damage / stacks up to level(maximun 8 stacks).
enchantment.mamy.hollowcurse.desc: Can't unequiped and disappear when dead.
enchantment.mamy.carve.desc: Everytime attack target it gonna decrease protection amount.
enchantment.mamy.missilehomming.desc: When use crossbow with firework a firework'll going to direction that you look at.
death.attack.hogyoku: %1$s Your soul are now starting kindle.
death.attack.bleedout: %1$s Lack of blood because own sadistic.
